website_summaries.verdict: An effective jade roller in pretty packaging.
pros: For facial problems including redness and puffiness
May reduce the appearance of pores, too

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Splurge!
customer_reviews.text: I had been so skeptical of buying one of these for a while, but after hearing so many wonderful things about them from fashion bloggers that I follow and other people, I decided to give it a shot and I have no regrets! Now this roller will not contour your face into looking like Christy Turlington or anything, but it certainly does work and you definitely notice a difference in your face when doing a side by side differ of Rolling it on one side of the face. And it feels good on the skin and doesn’t crack and squeak like so many other ones I have read that do.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This rose quartz roller costs a pretty penny..... BUT it is worth it for me. I use my roller daily and feel so much better afterward. I loved mine so much that I purchased one as a gift for someone I know who is going through a very stressful time in her life. She agreed that this is a wonderful luxury that is worth everything I paid for it LOL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: BEST ROSE QUARTZ ROLLER OUT THERE!
customer_reviews.text: This roller is nice and heavy. I can tell its going to last for over 2 years, past the life of my last one! I store my roller in the refrigerator for a more fresh and cooling effect. It works better in the refrigerator, I feel. Great product, though it was $60, I say its worth the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amie Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product exceeded my expectations! Heavy rose quart, gorgeous rose gold accents, and clear lucite-looking material on the handle makes this piece an eye-catcher. I can’t say that this helps my moisturizer soak in any differently than before, but I definitely feel like I’m getting a luxrious facial when I use this.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Cooling and calming.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. I overdid it one night on my skincare regimen- used my Glytone and Clarisonic, then my GloPro, so my skin was overworked and raw, not to mention using an overly active moisturizer after both. This was so cooling and calming afterwards and really calmed down my inflamed skin, without even refrigerating it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: wendi

customer_reviews.title: Proper technique when using tool method...
customer_reviews.text: Simple and effective....you feel your blood circulate from gentle pushing back from inwards to outwards of the skin...also if refrigerated, the rose stones cooling affect, calms irritated skin, and soothes it with an aloe gel or soothing face serum or mist...very nice, will purchase an additional one for travel...
customer_reviews.author: jackjones525829

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Quality - Not Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: This product broke after only two uses. I reached out to the brand and received horrible customer service. Super disappointed with BeautyBio, will not be shopping again.
customer_reviews.author: YONGYONG Z.

customer_reviews.title: Broken at first then an ugly green, rusty looking replacement without a box are they joking?
customer_reviews.text: the first one i got was in a beautiful box, and was the correct brand but it arrived broken. THen i asked for a replacement and received a completely different item, green, used/old looking without a box, smaller not even the same item. is this a joke? back it goes, waste of time and money with this back and forth!!!!
customer_reviews.author: IsaacsMom

customer_reviews.title: So cool to the touch
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. Haven’t had it that long. It is cool to the touch and feels good on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda J. Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money, I did -_____-
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your time ladies, it’s just a pretty roller but really waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Naima

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: The weight of this roller is great-I keep it in the fridge and I love using it after I put on my face serums in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Mawhinney

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this! I have purchased it now twice for friends, it really helps with puffiness, and just helps cool you down. I use it in the morning and night.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Relaxes my face
customer_reviews.text: It’s great!!! Tighten my skin and drains my sinuses I love this thing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Terry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gift-giving!
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be a holiday gift so I can’t weigh in on usage. What I can tell you is that it’s beautiful and packaged so nicely it’s perfect for gift-giving. I can wrap the entire box. It even smells nice, which seems weird but what I mean is that it doesn’t have an unpleasant plastic packaging scent. I think she’ll be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Some Chick

customer_reviews.title: Rose Quartz, cool and refreshing on the skin.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on Prime day as I love gemstones. This is very refreshing on the face, cool and easy to use. The video is very helpful and what better way to use this on the face when sitting and watching a television movie!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, cool facial therapy
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, heavy stone which stays cool whether in fridge or not. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: MITCHELLD

customer_reviews.title: Quality Roller
customer_reviews.text: I recently got a blocked lymph channel in my eye (weird, I know) that manifested as an irritating bubble on my eyeball. Eye doctor said there was no treatment other than surgery, but to my astonishment, it completely cleared up after I got a facial massage. Not wanting to experience that again, I was glad to get this rose quartz roller so I can keep up with my facial massage. This roller is high quality, rolls easily, and is very smooth and cool. Feels great on my face. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: JJL

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality quartz roller
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure what's going on but there's a mixed up with the reviews or the product. Right now the product in the picture is a quartz roller which I recently received. Some of the reviews here is for derma rollers. I hope Amazon straighten this up. The quartz roller is a very good quality product. It is well made and the quartz are good size and construction is not shabby at all. Rolling this on your face feels like being pampered at a spa. Packaging itself is also great which makes it a nice item for gifting.
customer_reviews.author: Nuk

customer_reviews.title: solid roller
customer_reviews.text: the quality and design of this product is good. I am using this item as part of a weekly skin care. Whilst I can't vouch if there is a long term benefit, but I know that at my local spa they do use this item in facial treatments. This is just one item of many to assist in self care. I can say that the product is well made and the hold is comfortable and substantial. the roller is heavy and I assume that it is all rose quartz. this hasn't broken for me to test if there isnt another rock component.
customer_reviews.author: Sincerely Yours

customer_reviews.title: Small roller gets stuck
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t nocited any dramatic results since using this for over a month now but it does feel refreshing on the face. I use this after putting on my vitamin c serum nightly and it instantly cools my face and takes away some of the redness. The small one inch roller doesn’t roll correctly, it gets stuck so I deducted a star for that. Overall it’s nice but not sure if it works any better then a cool compress on the face.
customer_reviews.author: PartyofFive

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Beauty BIO Rose Quartz Roller, 1.5 lb is a really well made and heavy feeling roller. This is not some plastic piece of low quality junk. It is also very attractive. Using it to apply lotion to your face really helps you feel the product being absorbed and the massaging of your skin gets the blood flowing. I have a few of these in different sizes and am pleased with the way they work. Clean up is easy. Rinse them off and then wipe down with some alcohol and its ready for the next use. Great gift item as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kortick

customer_reviews.title: No visible results yet
customer_reviews.text: I will update this review if I see any improvement. I think it should be used after using the bio-needle thing, but I don't have that. I thought this would work on its own, but all it does is apply roller-type pressure to your face, which accomplishes what exactly? I don't know. It is very pretty and looks well made which is why it garnered two stars instead of just one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in my refrigerator and use it in the morning and night to massage my face. I love rose quartz and set the intention of the stones and clean it energetically every month or so so keep the positive and loving energy of the rose quartz. It stimulates blood flow in my face and it feels lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: mmmmm
customer_reviews.text: I used this immediately. And it felt heavenly. Very cool and moist, actually. It wasn't wet of course, but my skin reacted to it as if it were. I loved the feeling of it gliding over my skin. I wish it were in a two-sized variety so there was a slightly smaller one for delicate areas like under the eyes and that this one was larger to cover more surface. It will be a go-to tool for me regardless of size.
customer_reviews.author: Arwen in NM

customer_reviews.title: Love your skin
customer_reviews.text: I initially was a little confused on how this work and was kind of skeptical if it did work if at all. After I use a microderm roller, I use this with my moisturizer. Its like a giant massage for my face and really helps the lotions and serums to even out over my face as well as save me from using excessive product. I hear that rose quartz improves your love life... I do love my skin and how this makes my face feel.
customer_reviews.author: J + W

customer_reviews.title: Great for the mornings!
customer_reviews.text: The Rose Quartz roller is great to to help with puffiness - my face is always puffy when I wake up and I wash my face and then grab my Jade roller from the freezer and apply my HERBIVORE Emerald Hemp Seed Deep Moisture Glow Oil and go through the movements with the roller. My face feels fresh and the coldness from the Rose Quartz roller really is invigorating.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Tinsley

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I can't say whether this works magic, but I will say I enjoy using it. It's very cool and smooth to the tough and it feels great against my skin. I did look at videos to show me how to use it and get the most out of it, if it does work and while I haven't seen any significant change in my skin I will continue using as it feels amazing and it can't hurt to use it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: What a Beauty!
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is lovely, and it comes with a cloth bag to keep the roller in. It's really cool to the touch and feels nice rolled across the skin. The rose quartz is a beautiful pink color on both ends. I'm in love with this and can see how nice rolling rose quartz on my heart and face, and maybe even include it in my Reiki work.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Alberigi McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Feels Nice
customer_reviews.text: This roller feels nice when I use it on my face at the end of the day. It seems to help with the puffyness or the redness of my face. I like how cool it feels when my face is hot too!
customer_reviews.author: Meijer Bjorn

customer_reviews.title: Super high-quality roller
customer_reviews.text: This BEAUTYBIO Rose quartz roller is very high-quality. Not only is it beautiful, it is very functional. The handle is easy to hold. I like that it has a large and a small end. There is no squeaking when you roll this. The metal is also of high quality. This will definitely last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: 💚TosaTat💚

customer_reviews.title: bigger than others
customer_reviews.text: This Rose Quartz Roller has a big side and a small side. The smaller roller is great for around your eyes and small areas. The larger roller is great for your face, neck, and other areas on your body. This also comes with a storage bag and it is easy to clean with a damp cloth.
customer_reviews.author: CoCo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love it...
customer_reviews.text: This is well made and very well priced. I love this Glide Rose Quartz Roller it's great for relieving tension on various body parts or spreading a rub/ointment onto problem areas. Cleaning it is as simple as a quick wipe down and back to the nifty storage bag it goes.
customer_reviews.author: K-cee Kit

customer_reviews.title: larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice rose quartz roller and is larger than the one I currently have. It feels really great and is great for massaging your face and other areas. This roller appears well made and should last a lifetime. It is also nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: This Rose Quartz Roller Is So Beautiful, I might Make It Into A Necklace!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t see any difference on my skin, but I love how this quartz makes me feel, and, everyone looks better when they feel happy! I love the smooth cold stone massaging my skin!
customer_reviews.author: DJY51

product_meta.title: BeautyBio GloPRO Rose Quartz Roller
product_meta.description:
Style:Rose Quartz RollerGlide Rose Quartz Roller over target areas. Can be used on face, eye, neck and body. To clean your Rose Quartz Roller, wipe gently with a damp cloth and towel dry after each use. For the inner Go-getters goddess looking to harness her chakra and seriously de-puff and de-stress. Can be used throughout the day as desired. Use after topical skincare application to maximize benefits. Store in bag provided for on-the-go use. Tool cannot be cleaned in water temperatures that exceed 176 DegreeF/80 ℃. Do not use alcohol or soapy water to clean tool. Simply wipe clean with warm water and a soft cloth.

BRAND STORY
Beauty Bio is bringing truth to beauty, which means total transparency. Our R&D roots help us create high performance technology backed by science and a skincare routine that is easy, effective and stress-free.
